question: "Kurja-Patti" or "Tasti-Patti" is referred to as which of the following during the time of the Maratha empire under Peshwas?
option3: One year income of the tax payers
option4: The fine charged for tax evasion
answer: One year income of the tax payers
explanation: \"Kurja-Patti\" or \"Tasti-Patti\" is referred to as one-year income of the taxpayers. It was levied from all landholders during the time of financial emergency.
